page.title: 06Legionnaires Disease(Staffs)
page.content: An inquiry has been launched after 39 people died of the disease.At least 160 people were taken ill and taken into hospital.Many nurses,doctors and other people connected with the hospital have proved to have had mild doses of the disease.At first victims were being treated for bronchial pheumonia until the legionnaires disease virus was discovered.One theory on where the bacteria was cultivated is,in a cooling tower at the new Stafford District General Hospital.As the water carrying the disease evaporated,the germs became airborne and spread via the air conditioning system to the outpatients department.Normally the bacteria which forms in air conditioning systems is killed by biocides -usually chlorine. The effectiveness of this treatment is to be considered by the inquiry.
